import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function EditDraft(){ const { id } = useParams(); const [draft , setDraft] = useState({ title: '', category: '', hostedBy: '', featuring: '', dressCode: '', date: '', time: '', price: '', des }) useEffect(()=> { fetch(`/drafts/${id}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setDraft(data)) }, [id]) const [title, setTitle] = useState(draft.title) useEffect(() => { setTitle(draft.title); }, [draft]); console.log(draft); return( <>
